description: Make this quick smoked salmon pasta with spring vegetables for a fresh 30-minute meal loaded with flavour.
keywords: Smoked Salmon and Spring Vegetable Spaghetti
name: Smoked Salmon and Spring Vegetable Spaghetti Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Woolworths frozen Australian baby peas

recipeInstructions.text: Add ricotta, reserved cooking liquid, lemon juice and dill. Cook for 1 minute or until heated through. Add ricotta mixture and salmon to pasta and toss to combine. Serve topped with zest and extra dill.
